name: Bouncing Over It with friends
description:
Bouncing Over it with friends is a challenging and punishing platforming game about climbing to the top of the world. A different take on Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy and Golfing Over It with Alva Majo, featuring multiplayer.

Compete with your friends, find hidden secrets, fail, fail, fail again, but never forget, the greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall!GAME FEATURES
  • A huge world to explore
  • An online multiplayer mode to compete/cooperate with your friends (up to 10)
  • Many secrets and easter eggs for you to discover
  • 12 Achievements from easy to very hard for the bravest of the brave
  • Cute slime balls, and 10 different colors to chose from
  • A real challenge, can you beat it?
